email.cold-outreach: Write a professional cold outreach email to [TARGET_ROLE] at [COMPANY] about [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Keep it under 150 words, mention a specific pain point, and include a clear call-to-action.
email.follow-up: Create a friendly follow-up email for [PROSPECT_NAME] who showed interest in [PRODUCT/SERVICE] during our [INTERACTION_TYPE] on [DATE]. Include a valuable resource or insight.
email.newsletter: Draft a weekly newsletter for [AUDIENCE] about [TOPIC]. Include 3 key insights, 1 actionable tip, and 1 resource recommendation.

social.linkedin: Create a LinkedIn post about [TOPIC] that positions [COMPANY/INDIVIDUAL] as a thought leader. Include a hook, valuable insight, and engagement question.
social.twitter: Write a tweet about [TOPIC] that provides immediate value to [AUDIENCE]. Use relevant hashtags and keep it under 280 characters.
social.instagram: Create an Instagram caption for [CONTENT_TYPE] about [TOPIC]. Include a compelling hook, valuable information, and call-to-action.

planning.daily: Create a prioritized daily plan for [BUSINESS_GOAL]. Include 3 main tasks, 2 quick wins, and 1 learning objective.
planning.weekly: Develop a weekly strategy for [OBJECTIVE]. Break down into daily themes, key milestones, and success metrics.
planning.quarterly: Outline a quarterly roadmap for [BUSINESS_AREA]. Include goals, key initiatives, resource requirements, and success criteria.

marketing.landing-page: Write compelling copy for a landing page about [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include headline, subheadline, 3 key benefits, and strong CTA.
marketing.ad-copy: Create ad copy for [PLATFORM] promoting [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include primary message, 2-3 benefits, and compelling CTA.
marketing.case-study: Outline a case study structure for [CLIENT] who achieved [RESULT] using [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include challenge, solution, and measurable outcomes.
